Text.Language: Pao#c# I/#c# P,#c#: v/e~taf,af qen pim~hau: eke~qomqem n~qr/i n~q/ten: n~]couri n~te v~mou.
My Lord Jesus Christ: Who was placed in the tomb: You shall trample within us: the thorn of death.
